metadata.Title: CVE-2017-8287 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
FreeType 2 before 2017-03-26 has an out-of-bounds write caused by a heap-based buffer overflow related to the t1_builder_close_contour function in psaux/psobjs.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-8287` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

freetype2-demos - 2.5.2-1ubuntu2.8
libfreetype6 - 2.5.2-1ubuntu2.8
No subscription required

criterions.comment: freetype package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.5.2-1ubuntu2.8').
